definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: The hitherto unutilized amount of the property value is opened for use.
sentences.chinese: 迄今未动用余额的财产价值是开放供使用。

sentences.english: In the mean while, it shall write off the amount of the relevant receivable reinsurance reserve.
sentences.chinese: 同时，转销相关应收分保准备金余额。

sentences.english: It carries over no balance. It allows no overdraft.
sentences.chinese: 它没有设置余额，也不允许透支。

sentences.english: With reduced savings, the public has less capital to invest in engineering projects.
sentences.chinese: 结余额减少了，公众投资工程项目的资金也就减少了。

sentences.english: The trade contract stipulates for the settlement of balances in RMB.
sentences.chinese: 贸易合同规定余额以人民币结算。

sentences.english: Some bookkeepers use a far fight-hand column to keep an up-to-date balance of the account.
sentences.chinese: 有的账薄在右边再加一栏，记载账户的最新余额。

sentences.english: Bonus after the customer's balance is less than, the order does not count the transaction agent commission.
sentences.chinese: 客户余额小于赠金后交易的订单不计入代理返佣。

sentences.english: Opening balances vary from institution to institution.
sentences.chinese: 期初余额不同的机构体制。

sentences.english: The balance is forty_three thousand Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 费用余额是港币四万三千元。

sentences.english: The account of withdrawals has debit balances.
Now let's check an account balance, and see whether we have incurred any bank fees.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们检查帐户余额，看是否产生了银行费用。

sentences.english: The reduction of the balance on your bank account indicates the completion of the payment.
sentences.chinese: 如果成功交费，银行卡余额会有相应数量的减少。

sentences.english: Interest is continually charged on the unpaid balance.
sentences.chinese: 利息就可以在未付的余额上来算。

sentences.english: Now is a good time to check if you have any money left on your Ray Ban sale spending account.
sentences.chinese: 现在是查看你的雷朋网账户余额的最好时机。

sentences.english: Kindly remit us the balance without delay .
sentences.chinese: 请立即把余额汇给我们。

sentences.english: Frauds often end up with overstated cash balances.
sentences.chinese: 舞弊常常导致现金与银行存款余额的虚增。

definition: to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
Ant Check Later, consumer credit service offered by Ant Financial Services 螞蟻金服|蚂蚁金服[Ma3 yi3 Jin1 fu2]
